text: Pas, cun farzandas Ismoil ʙa sinne rasid, ki ʙo padari xud koru kusis tavonad kard, guft (padar ʙa pisaras): «Ej pisarakam, haroina, dar xoʙ didaam, ki turo, ʙesuʙha, zaʙh mekunam. Bingar, ki ci meandesi» Guft (Ismoil) «Ej padar, ʙa har ci farmon sudai dar mavridi zaʙhi man amal kun, ki agar Alloh ʙixohad, maro az soʙiron xohi joft»
